title: Addition Property
text: The addition property states that if $$a \geq b$$, then $$a+c \geq b+c$$.
speech: The addition property states that if  a is greater than or equal to, b , then  a, plus c is greater than or equal to, b plus c .
pacedSpeech: The addition property states that if   a is greater than or equal to, b
, then   a, plus c is greater than or equal to, b plus c

title: Addition Property
text: What should we add on both sides in order to isolate the variable with its coefficient on the left?
speech: What should we add on both sides in order to isolate the variable with its coefficient on the left?
pacedSpeech: What should we add on both sides in order to isolate the variable with its coefficient on the left?

title: Addition Property
text: What do we get when we add $$-7-2x$$ on both sides?
speech: What do we get when we add  minus 7 minus 2 x  on both sides?
pacedSpeech: What do we get when we add   minus 7 minus 2 x

title: Multiplication Property
text: The multiplication property states that if $$a \geq b$$ and $$c>0$$, then $$ac \geq bc$$.
speech: The multiplication property states that if  a is greater than or equal to b  and  c, is greater than 0 , then  a c is greater than or equal to, b c .
pacedSpeech: The multiplication property states that if   a is greater than or equal to b
, then   a c is greater than or equal to, b c

title: Multiplication Property
text: What number should we multiply on both sides in order to isolate the variable by itself on the left?
speech: What number should we multiply on both sides in order to isolate the variable by itself on the left?
pacedSpeech: What number should we multiply on both sides in order to isolate the variable by itself on the left?

title: Multiplication Property
text: What do we get when we multiply $$\frac{1}{2}$$ on both sides?
speech: What do we get when we multiply  1 half  on both sides?
pacedSpeech: What do we get when we multiply   1 half
